titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to promote public awareness of Down syndrome.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
2/23/2009--Introduced.
Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend, and the United States Postal Service to issue, a commemorative postage stamp to promote public awareness of Down syndrome.
